events.name: Wolverhampton Wanderers at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Glenn Murray scored his 100th goal for the club -- only the second player to do so -- to move Brighton level on points with Manchester United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton beat Wolves, third successive win

headlines.description: Fulham suffered their fourth consecutive Premier League loss and remain in the bottom three after a 3-0 loss to Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth win at Fulham to stay fifth

headlines.description: Sadio Mane scored a brace and Mohamed Salah continued his return to form as Liverpool beat Cardiff to go top of the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah, Mane star as Liverpool beat Cardiff

headlines.description: Newcastle United's winless start to the Premier League season continued as they were held to a goalless draw by Southampton at St Mary's.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle still winless after 0-0 draw with Southampton

headlines.description: Roberto Pereyra and Gerard Deulofeu were both on the scoresheet as Watford beat Huddersfield Town 3-0 in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Watford send Huddersfield to bottom of table

events.name: West Ham United at Leicester City

headlines.description: West Ham thought they had secured the points after Fabian Balbeuna's opener, but Wilfred Ndidi equalised late on for Leicester.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester leave it late to draw with West Ham
